short_summary: Request to Establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer for Asbestos Abatement
description: Reissue of Request for Standing Offers: This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number W6896-23S055/B dated 2023-07-26 with a closing of 2023-08-11 at 02:00 PM EDT. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-10-06 at 02:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 02:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of Nation Defence (DND) has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and material necessary for the inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Contract Title
### Asbestos and Mold Abatement

#### Details

* Reference Number: WS4055141766
* Solicitation Number: WS4055141766
* Tender Number: WS4055141766
* Publication Date: September 20, 2023
* Closing Date: October 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

#### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids from qualified contractors for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials necessary for the inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring, and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.

#### Specifications
The contract is for a Regional Individual Standing Offer. The scope of work includes:

* Hazardous material decontamination
* Specialist licensed labour
* Equipment and tools
* Transportation and supervision
* Asbestos removal and disposal

#### Evaluation and Award
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All bids submitted after the closing date and time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
Christopher Lau, Contractual Authority
c.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Do not contact for technical inquiries. Respond to this notice to obtain an Access Number and proceed with bid submission.

#### Additional Information
Tender documents are available on the Government Electronics and Telecommunications (GEAT) Processes contract management system. 

This contract will be awarded according to the rules and procedures of the National Evaluation Policy and the Federal Treasury Board's Contracting Policy.

This request supersedes previous RFSO number W6896-23S055/B with a previous closing date of August 11, 2023.
